ModMetaData.name: Extreme Worlds
ModMetaData.author: Why_is_that
ModMetaData.description: [h1][b]Features:[/b][/h1] - Adds ScenPart to customize world temperatures - ScenPart exposes 'customTemperatures' curve to allow for scenarios to utilize completely different world temperatures - ScenPart UI expanded to allow customization via Scerario Editor - Two new scenarios added to eximplify the new ScenPart: 'Frozen Tribe' and 'Hot And Naked' (completely untested for playability)
